general.identifier: This will be replaced when the learning object is submitted to the repository

catalogentry.catalog: Replace this text with the name of a catalog (e.g. "ISBN")

entry.langstring: Replace this entry with the value of the catalog entry (e.g. the ISBN number)

description.langstring: This is a self-contained workshop on [INSERT DESCRIPTOR FROM TITLE OF WORKSHOP HERE]. It is part of the National Adult Literacy Database series on: INSERT NAME OF SERIES HERE.

centity.vcard: Fill in the vCard data of the contributor here - one for each person involved: NAME OF CONTENT AUTHOR; STA NAME HERE (technical implementer)

date.datetime: Replace this text with today's date e.g. "2003-04-04"

technical.format: HTML, gif (MODIFY ACCORDINGLY - WHAT TECHNICAL ELEMENTS ARE IN THE LESSON?)
technical.size: ENTER SIZE OF FILE IN KILOBYTES
technical.location: ENTER URL OF RESOURCE: LOCATE FROM: http://www.calss.utoronto.ca/publications.htm

otherplatformrequirements.langstring: These materials are available online and require a computer and internet connection. The materials can also be printed for distribution as a handout.
